column1: #Text=Was that supposed to be you breaking up with her ?
#Text=" Tu says : " Did n't sound like a breakup .
#Text=We both knew — Can I just get on with the rest of my story or what ?
#Text=But I hope you were n't as ambiguous with Korra as you were with Asami .
#Text=" Mako says : " Trust me , I was n't .
